𓍒 𓍑 𓍖 𓍘 𓊮 𓌃

𓍑 󴡱 󴡲 󴡳 󴡴 󴡵

Two clearly distinguishable forms with two distinct readings, yet often confused

1. Tűz

𓍑 #ḏ drill fire-drill
𓍑 #ḏ 𓍑 𓄿 𓂋 ḏꜣr darben “need” דאַרף τέρπω térpō, “I delight, please” 𓊵 𓏏 𓊪
𓍑 #ḏ dz tz ts צ צֹ zünd IZI 𒉈 hitze heize hait͡sʼe 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓊮 heat < 𓐍 𓏏 𓊮 < 𓂋 𓎡 𓎛 𓏏 𓊮
𓍑 #ḏ matz 𓌃 metz mots

Caucasian Hungarian Manchu Dravidian
𓍑 🔥 Tűz tɔɣɔ цӏе t͡sʼe թեժ tʰɛʒ амца ɑmt͡sʰɑ am.thyssa ცეცხლი t͡sʰɛt͡sʰxli 𓍑 𓍑 𓏤
𓍑 🔥 thyss heiss hotüz (fire) => heizen,brennen: տեսնել tɛsnɛl დაწვავს dɑt͡sˀv შეწვავს ʃɛ't͡sˀv cook
𓈑 ⋍ 𓏏 𓆇 𓆱

𓍑 𓄿 𓂋 𓅂 | need | צורך \ צֹרֶךְ tsórekh ज़रूरत zarūrat ضَرُورَة ḍarūra 𐌸𐌰𐍂𐌱𐌰 þarba darb ⲭⲣⲓⲁ
𓋴 𓅱 𓍑 𓄿 𓂻 | go | spatzieren 𓍑 #ḏ dz tz ts izi 𒉈
𓏲 𓍑 𓄿 𓉐 | storehouse |

𓍑 𓍒 צורך <> 𒍠 ZAG Zeugnis жи̑г žȋg žig "sign" "token" zaĝ /seng/ 𒍠𒋙 *dʰegʷʰ brand (singe)

Tűz Pyro

𒁲𒉺𒊒 di-pa-ru
𒁲𒉺𒊒 torch •*torca torque (ƒ)

2. Feuer

𓍑 ⋍ 𓍒 🔥 Feu' pyr' fire 𓄿 𓆑 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 'fry faire (drill)
𓍑 ⋍ 𓍒 𒉋 PEL pyro 𒉋 BIL brazier 𓃀 𓂋 | burn / boil | 𓃀 𓂋 𓃀 𓂋 𓊮
𓍑 prosperous in 𓋹 𓍑 𓋴 may he live, be prosperous and healthy, LPH

𒉺𒀪𒄯 pa-aḫ-ḫur /paḫḫur/ fire
𒉺𒄴𒄯 paḫḫur pyro, fire, fever πῦρ (pûr), Old Armenian հուր (hur), Tocharian B puwar

𓍑 𓄿 𓍑 𓄿 𓏲 porphyry = faience 𓍘 ++
𓍑 𓅱 𓂻 fare! faire fahre (go out ...) 发​ fā
𓍑 𓊛 ferry 筏 fá
𓍑 𓏏 𓏴 faut faux-pas 非 fēi Fehler falsch fault 乏 fá
𓍑 𓄿 𓏴 𓊠 fetch, pierce, trans-fix
𓍑 𓇋 𓋴 𓀜 fight 伐 fá fällen
𓍑 𓄿 𓇋 𓋴 𓅱 𓀁 𓀀 (de)fiant
𓍑 𓄿 𓀀 𓀀 𓀀 Feinde fiends
𓍑 𓄿 𓏴 𓊛 𓇾 𓈇 𓏤 inter-fere
𓍑 𓄿 𓆑 𓊮 fheizen: heat 火灾 huǒzāi or
𓍑 𓄿 𓆑 𓊮 pyrvn: burn or feuern
𓍑 𓄿 𓅱 𓇰 phyrNyx? (night pyhare@Guaraní 밤 bɑm-fire 夜 よる fyoru)
𓍑 𓆓 𓂂 𓏏 𓀀 𓀀 𓀀 fascists 閥 fá
𓍑 𓏏 𓏏 𓐕 field
